  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:merli.xtec.cat:merli/2402</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>MERLI</catalog>
            <entry>merli/2402</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="ca">Aula virtual</string>
            <string language="en">Virtual classroom</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Virtuelles Klassenzimmer</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Salle de classe virtuelle</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Sala de aula virtual</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Aula virtuale</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εικονική τάξη</string>
          </title>
          <language>ca</language>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="ca">Pàgina web d'una professora que ofereix enllaços a diversos recursos per practicar anglès classificats per nivells i destreses. També hi ha un fòrum i una pàgina amb treballs d'alumnes.</string>
            <string language="en">A teacher's webpage that provides links to a series of resources, classified by level and skills, for practising English. There is also a forum and a page with students' projects.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">llengua anglesa</string>
            <string language="en">English language</string>
            <string language="es">lengua inglesa</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">gramàtica</string>
            <string language="en">grammar</string>
            <string language="es">gramática</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">lectura</string>
            <string language="en">reading</string>
            <string language="es">lectura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">escriptura</string>
            <string language="en">writing</string>
            <string language="es">escritura</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Webseite eines Lehrers, die Links zu einer Reihe 
Betriebsmitteln zur Verfügung stellt, eingestuft durch Stufe und 
Fähigkeiten, für übendes Englisch. Es gibt auch ein Forum und
eine Seite mit Projekten der Kursteilnehmer.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La page Web d'un professeur qui fournit des 
liens à une série de ressources, classifiée par le niveau et les 
qualifications, pour l'anglais de pratique. Il y a également un
forum et une page avec les projets des étudiants.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Web page de um professor que fornece as 
ligações a uma série dos recursos, classificada pelo nível e pelas
habilidades, para o inglês praticando. Há também um forum e 
uma página com projetos dos estudantes.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Web page dell'insegnante che fornisce i 
collegamenti ad una serie di risorse, classificata per il livello e le
abilità, per l'inglese esercitantesi. Ci è egualmente una 
tribuna e una pagina con i progetti degli allievi.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το webpage ενός δασκάλου που παρέχει τις συνδέσεις 
με μια σειρά στοιχείων συμπεριφοράς, που ταξινομείται από το 
επίπεδο και τις δεξιότητες, για την άσκηση των αγγλικών. 
Υπάρχει επίσης ένα φόρουμ και μια σελίδα προγράμματα με 
των σπουδαστών ".</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Englische Sprache</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Grammatik</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Messwert</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Schreiben</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Anglais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">grammaire</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">lecture</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">écriture</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Língua inglesa</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">gramática</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">leitura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">escrita</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Lingua inglese</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">grammatica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">lettura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">scrittura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αγγλική γλώσσα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">γραμματική</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ανάγνωση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">γράψιμο</string>
          </keyword>
